@import "tailwindcss";

@theme {
  /* Core Palette: Midnight blues */
  --rich-black: #0d1b2a;
  --oxford-blue: #1b263b;
  --yinmn-blue: #415a77;
  --silver-lake-blue: #778da9;
  --platinum: #e0e1dd;

  /* Neutral helpers */
  --pale-platinum: #f5f6f7;
  --mist-blue: #c2cad4;
  --slate-500: #8a97aa;
  --slate-700: #5c6c83;

  /* Semantic Roles (default theme: dark via prefers-color-scheme) */
  --color-background-primary: var(--rich-black);
  --color-background-secondary: var(--oxford-blue);

  --color-text-primary: var(--platinum);
  --color-text-secondary: var(--mist-blue);
  --color-text-muted: var(--slate-500);

  --color-border: var(--yinmn-blue);
  --color-divider: var(--yinmn-blue);

  --color-accent-primary: var(--silver-lake-blue);
  --color-accent-secondary: var(--yinmn-blue);
  --color-accent: var(--color-accent-primary);
  --color-accent-hover: var(--color-accent-secondary);

  --color-link: var(--color-accent-primary);
  --color-link-hover: var(--color-accent-secondary);
  --color-icon: var(--color-text-primary);
  --color-icon-hover: var(--color-accent-primary);

  /* Semantic aliases for compatibility with the updated system */
  --color-bg: var(--color-background-primary);
  --color-surface: var(--color-background-secondary);
  --color-primary: var(--color-accent-primary);
  --color-primary-hov: var(--color-accent-secondary);

  --color-text: var(--color-text-primary);
  --color-text-tertiary: var(--mist-blue);
  --color-muted: var(--color-text-muted);
  --color-code-bg: #12263a;
  --color-code-inline-bg: rgba(119, 141, 169, 0.2);

  /* Semantic: Status */
  --color-success: #4ade80;
  --color-warning: #facc15;
  --color-danger: #f87171;
  --color-info: #38bdf8;
  --color-error: var(--color-danger);

  /* Font Families */
  --font-family-body: 'Geist', 'Inter', 'PP Neue Montreal', 'PP Supply Sans', system-ui,
    -apple-system, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
  --font-family-heading: 'Geist', 'Inter', 'PP Neue Montreal', 'PP Supply Sans', system-ui,
    -apple-system, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;
  --font-family-code: 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Code', 'Courier New', monospace;

  /* Font Sizes */
  --font-size-xs: 0.75rem;
  --font-size-sm: 0.8125rem;
  --font-size-base: 0.9375rem;
  --font-size-md: 1rem;
  --font-size-lg: 1.125rem;
  --font-size-xl: 1.5rem;
  --font-size-2xl: 2rem;

  /* Line Heights */
  --line-height-tight: 1.2;
  --line-height-snug: 1.3;
  --line-height-normal: 1.4;
  --line-height-relaxed: 1.5;
  --line-height-loose: 1.6;

  /* Letter Spacing */
  --letter-spacing-tight: -0.02em;
  --letter-spacing-normal: -0.01em;

  /* Spacing Scale */
  --spacing: 0.25rem;
  --spacing-xs: 0.25rem;
  --spacing-sm: 0.5rem;
  --spacing-md: 1rem;
  --spacing-lg: 1.5rem;
  --spacing-xl: 2rem;
  --spacing-2xl: 3rem;
  --spacing-3xl: 4rem;
  --spacing-4xl: 6rem;

  /* Border Radius */
  --radius-none: 0;
  --radius-sm: 0.25rem;
  --radius-md: 0.375rem;
  --radius-lg: 0.5rem;
  --radius-full: 9999px;

  /* Breakpoints */
  --breakpoint-tablet: 768px;
  --breakpoint-desktop: 1024px;
  --breakpoint-wide: 1280px;

  /* Z-Index */
  --z-index-header: 1000;
  --z-index-overlay: 2000;
  --z-index-modal: 3000;

  /* Transitions */
  --transition-default: all 0.2s ease;
  --transition-hover: 0.2s ease;
  --transition-color: color 0.2s ease;

  /* Opacity */
  --opacity-disabled: 0.5;
  --opacity-hover: 0.8;
  --opacity-muted: 0.6;

  /* Shadows (minimal use in dark theme) */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

:root {
  --nav-link-line-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
  --nav-link-line-height: 12px;
}

/* Base Styles */
body {
  background-color: var(--color-background-primary);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  font-family: var(--font-family-body);
  font-size: var(--font-size-md);
  line-height: var(--line-height-loose);
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

.page-shell {
  padding-inline: calc(var(--spacing) * 4);
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .page-shell {
    padding-inline: 0;
  }
}

.sr-only {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border: 0;
}

.font-mono {
  font-family: var(
    --font-family-code,
    'Geist Mono',
    'JetBrains Mono',
    'Fira Code',
    'PP Supply Sans Mono',
    monospace
  );
}

/* Navigation wave animation (from animation_nav.md) */
.nav-wave { list-style: none; }
.nav-wave-item {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  height: 1.75rem; /* ~28px, keeps header compact */
  transition: background-position 0.9s linear;
}
.nav-wave-item:hover {
  /* Base64 SVG with brand accent (#778da9) */
  background: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,") no-repeat;
  background-size: 390px 12px;
  background-position: 0 100%;
  animation: nav-wave-line 2s;
}
.nav-wave-item:hover a {
  color: var(--color-accent-primary);
}

@keyframes nav-wave-line {
  0% { background-position: 390px 100%; }
  100% { background-position: 0 100%; }
}

/* Anchor-based wave, if we attach it to <a> (fallback) */
.nav-link-wave {
  position: relative;
}
.nav-link-wave::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: -0.3rem;
  height: 12px;
  pointer-events: none;
  background: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,") no-repeat;
  background-size: 390px 12px;
  background-position: 120% 100%;
  opacity: 0;
}
.nav-link-wave:hover::after,
.nav-link-wave:focus-visible::after {
  animation: nav-link-wave-sweep 2s forwards;
  opacity: 1;
}
@keyframes nav-link-wave-sweep {
  0% { background-position: 120% 100%; }
  100% { background-position: 0 100%; }
}

/* TEMP: debug border to verify hover targets */
.nav-link-wave {
  border-bottom: 2px solid transparent !important;
}
.nav-link-wave:hover,
.nav-link-wave:focus-visible {
  border-bottom-color: #ff4d4d !important;
}
.nav-wave-item:hover {
  outline: 1px dashed #ff4d4d;
}

.nav-link-animated {
  position: relative;
  padding-bottom: 0.3rem;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.nav-link-animated::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: -0.25rem;
  height: var(--nav-link-line-height);
  pointer-events: none;
  background-image: var(--nav-link-line-image);
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: 200% auto;
  background-position: 120% 100%;
  opacity: 0;
  transition:
    opacity 0.2s ease;
}
